channels.title: Channels
channels.addFirst: Add a channel to start receiving conversations
channels.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this channel? All conversations will be lost.
channels.limitReached: Channel limit reached for this plan

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Analytics and performance metrics
reports.comingSoonDescription: View detailed analytics, trends, and performance reports here.

settings.title: AI Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your AI assistant behavior and knowledge
settings.selectOrgDescription: Use the organization selector in the sidebar to configure AI settings.

modelConfig.title: AI Model Configuration
modelConfig.description: Technical parameters that control AI behavior and costs
modelConfig.modelDescription: The AI model used for generating responses
modelConfig.temperatureDescription: Lower = more focused and deterministic. Higher = more creative and varied.
modelConfig.maxTokensDescription: Maximum tokens per AI response (1 token â‰ˆ 4 characters)

systemPrompt.title: Default System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Define how the AI assistant behaves and responds to visitors
systemPrompt.placeholder: You are a helpful customer support assistant. Be friendly, professional, and answer questions about our products and services. If you don't know the answer, offer to connect the visitor with a human agent.

handoff.title: Human Handoff
handoff.description: Keywords that trigger automatic transfer to a human agent
handoff.enterKeyword: Type a keyword and press Enter or click Add (max 20)

preview.title: AI Preview
preview.description: How your AI will respond based on current settings:
preview.question: What are your business hours?
preview.answer: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. We're located in Miami, FL. Is there anything else I can help you with?

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Information the AI uses to answer questions (RAG)
knowledge.comingSoonDescription: You'll be able to upload documents, FAQs, and custom content for your AI to reference.

apiKey.title: Custom OpenAI Key
apiKey.description: Optional: use a separate API key for this organization
apiKey.helpText: Leave empty to use the global platform key. Only set this if this organization uses their own OpenAI account.

auth.title: Welcome back
auth.subtitle: Sign in to your ChatFlow360 dashboard

branding.headline: Get ChatFlow360, and Turn Traffic into Leads
branding.subheadline: The easiest way to run ChatFlow360, an AI-powered live chat for bilingual WordPress. Always on, designed to engage visitors in real-time across languages.

success.resetEmailSent: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.
